page.title: 18CHILDREN IN ORPINGTON
page.content: Approximately 55 children in Blenheim Junior school,average age 11 years, voted on their favourite topics to depict life in the 1980s, then recorded the results: {FOODS}: McDonalds 22; Roast 10; Chinese 9; Pizza 5; Salad 5; English Breakfast 5; Sausages and mash 1; Fish and chips 1. {POP GROUPS}: Wham 32; P.Hardcastle 11 ; Paul Young 3;Nik Kershaw 3;Queen 3; Ufo 1. {COMPUTERS}: Spectrum 20; Commodore64 15; Atari 12; BBC 8; Oric 3; Acorn 1. HOLIDAY RESORTS: Spain/Portugal 13; Greece 13; Devon/Cornwall 11; USA/Canada 7; Switzerland/Austria 4; Scotland 3; Russia 2; Italy 2; France 2; Wales 1. TOYS: Electronic games 29; Dolls 7; Board games 5; Jigsaws 5; Model kits 5; Construction 4;Tracks 2;Fantasy games 2
